heading: After school, when you reach home, you pull out your laptop and began checking through your email.
While checking through your email, you see this:
text: 👯Hi👩‍👩‍👧 there,  we've taken notice of your work experiences and resume listed on multiple online agencies such as LinkedIn, Jobstreet & Fastjobs. We're keen to offer you something on a part time basis that you could do in your free time. The daily wage could go as high as up to $600/day. Not only this but we will settle all wages on the day itself. If your keen to take up the offer, please click the link below for more information. If your using an android device reply "1" to subscribe <link redacted>

choices.label: Click on the link
choices.endMessage: When you log back in the next day, you notice that your computer cannot boot. Turns out, a hacker PWNed into your computer and proceeded to extract all your files before  deleting system32.

heading: You mark the email as spam. After checking through your email, you are bored so you decide to scroll through Whatsapp.
text:
Family
Today

老爸
Forwarded
今天是六月初六，据说这一天是一年之中阳气最旺的日子！中午一定要出外晒太阳三十分钟！ 记得要分享！祝福大家龙体安康~

老爸
等一下提醒我

What do you reply?

choices.label: 好的。
choices.endMessage: Your family went out to 晒太阳, only to get sunburnt and increased risk of skin cancer.

heading:
老爸
应该是真的，好朋友发的。

choices.label: 应该OK。
choices.endMessage: Your family went out to 晒太阳, only to get sunburnt and increased risk of skin cancer.

choices.label: Good job! You prevented your father from falling for fake news online!
you guys spamming quite a lot, can just DM
Next
choices.endMessage: Pro tip: Don't aggro someone who is already aggro

heading:
Classmate A
his problem

Classmate B
no bruh is you never do

choices.label: Next
choices.endMessage: Somehow, the argument got even worse, and the next day you see 1784 missed messages from the same 2 people, including certain insults.

choices.label: Next
choices.endMessage: I mean, it technically worked? But it's not optimal

heading: This actually works, but how do I continue the plot from here? Go try something else

Classmate A
he keep spamming me

Classmate B
no its his problem

choices.label: can we like stop for a while and chill
bruh can you guys not just pause

heading:
Classmate A
ok fine discuss later privately

Classmate B
ok

choices.label: Next
choices.endMessage: It worked. Also, in the end, they handled it properly.

heading:
老爸
中年人休闲中心的人转发的。

choices.label: 那应该OK。
choices.endMessage: Your family went out to 晒太阳, only to get sunburnt and increased risk of skin cancer.

heading: However, as someone probably once said, "一波还未平息，一波又来侵袭". You notice 387 missed messages in your class chat. Turns out, 2 of your classmates are arguing over PW in the class chat. What do you send?

choices.label: can you like not spam in the class chat
bruh why are you guys arguing over this kind of stuff
shaddup please thnx (Note: the use of the word "shaddup" here is a replacement of something considered as rude)
[Don't send anything, you've been on social media for too long]
can you guys like move this convo into your pw chat
wait can we like not argue just talk nicely
